title: How long does it take solar batteries to charge? - Quora

response.answer_text: Roughly the same time as it would take to charge any deep-cycle battery (e.g. marine battery, golf cart battery or leisure battery) of the same capacity and construction. To correctly charge a 100Ah golf cart battery from 50% DOD to full would take around 12 hours at 2.5A. With the same initial conditions, same construction (flooded, gel. AGM or VRLA) and same capacity, a solar battery would take almost exactly the same amount of time.

It depends on the solar conditions of the day and loads put on the output during charging. In all ideal conditions normally it takes 6–7 http://hrs.to charge a solar battery connected through a MPPT charge controller.
